frontMatter.title: Beginner Club Night at Claremont Stadium
frontMatter.summary: Join us tonight from 9pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium for Beginner Club Night. Whether you're new to badminton or need some practice, we'll have you rallying quickly. All 4 courts are open for a fun-filled evening!

prev.title: Wednesday Club Night at Claremont Stadium
prev.summary: Join us tonight from 8pm to 11pm at Claremont Stadium for Wednesday Club Night. Whether you're great at badminton or just starting, we‚Äôve got a court for you. Everyone‚Äôs welcome!
